skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML la...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Contains only documentation and color/font specifications. No network, filesystem, or execution capabilities.

content.user_title: Apply professional themes to presentations and documents
content.value_statement: Creating consistent, professional visual themes for presentations and documents takes significant design effort. This skill provides 10 curated color and font theme combinations that can be instantly applied to any artifact, plus the ability to generate custom themes on demand.
actual_capabilities: Apply 10 professional pre-set themes to any artifact
Generate custom themes based on description inputs
Access curated color palettes with hex codes
Use matched font pairings for headers and body text
Display theme showcase for visual selection
limitations: Does not directly modify files - provides guidance only
Themes are preset combinations - customizability is prompt-based
Does not integrate with design software APIs
Font availability depends on system fonts

use_cases.title: Corporate presentation styling
use_cases.description: Apply Ocean Depths or Modern Minimalist themes to professional decks for consistent branding.

use_cases.title: Marketing material themes
use_cases.description: Choose from Sunset Boulevard or Golden Hour themes for vibrant, engaging creative presentations.

use_cases.title: Document visual consistency
use_cases.description: Maintain visual identity across reports, slides, and landing pages with matched theme specifications.

prompt_templates.title: Apply existing theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the [Theme Name] theme to my presentation. Use the color palette and font pairings specified in the theme factory skill.

prompt_templates.title: Show theme options
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me all available themes from the theme factory. Display the color palettes and describe the use cases for each.

prompt_templates.title: Create custom theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a custom theme for [describe your use case]. Generate a cohesive color palette with hex codes and matched font pairings similar to the existing themes.

prompt_templates.title: Match brand colors
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a theme that matches these brand colors: [list colors]. Generate a complete theme with complementary accent colors, background colors, and font recommendations.

output_examples.input: Apply the Ocean Depths theme to my quarterly business review presentation

best_practices: Preview themes using the theme showcase before applying to understand visual impact
Consider your audience and context when selecting themes (corporate vs creative)
Request custom themes with specific mood or brand requirements for best results
anti_patterns: Applying high-contrast themes to content-heavy slides (reduces readability)
Mixing themes within a single presentation (creates visual inconsistency)
Ignoring font availability - verify selected fonts are available on target systems

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Installation required via the template system.

faq.question: How many themes are included?
faq.answer: Ten pre-set themes covering styles from corporate (Ocean Depths) to creative (Sunset Boulevard) and natural (Forest Canopy).

faq.question: Can I create custom themes?
faq.answer: Yes. Describe your requirements and the skill will generate a new theme with matching colors and fonts.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill contains no code execution, network access, or file system operations. It only provides design guidance.

faq.question: Why are my colors not applying?
faq.answer: The skill provides specifications only. The actual application depends on the tool or software you are using to create your artifact.

faq.question: How does this compare to design software?
faq.answer: This skill provides design guidance and theme specifications. Design software (PowerPoint, Figma) handles actual file modification.
